definition: big/huge/large/major/great/wide/deep/older (than)/oldest/eldest/greatly/very much/(dialect) father/father's elder or younger brother
to hold/to seize/to catch/to apprehend/to take/(used in the same way as 把[ba3]: to mark the following noun as a direct object)

sentences.english: He left his Montana ranch to his spinster sister.
sentences.chinese: 他把他在蒙大拿州的大牧場留給了他未婚妹妹。

sentences.english: A tangle of lightning, including multiple ground strikes, crackles in the Montana sky.
sentences.chinese: 一團閃電在蒙大拿上空噼啪作響，數條閃電砸向地面。

sentences.english: Take the time to reconnect to nature whether that's in Central Park or Montana.
sentences.chinese: 花些時間親近自然，不管是去中央公園還是去蒙大拿。

sentences.english: A cowboy in Jordan, Montana rounds up bucking broncos.
sentences.chinese: 一名蒙大拿州樛登市的牛仔在趕攏北美洲野馬。

sentences.english: The Smiths are moving to Montana for a change of scenery.
sentences.chinese: 史密斯一家爲了改變一下環境正把家搬到蒙大拿洲去。

sentences.english: My sister-in-law is a music teacher in a small school in western Montana.
sentences.chinese: 我嫂子是蒙大拿州西部的一個小學音樂老師。

sentences.english: Montana's "Cornflower Blue" Sapphire is known throughout the world.
sentences.chinese: 蒙大拿州的“矢車菊藍”藍寶石被稱爲世界各地。

sentences.english: Missouri River, Montana brown trout. Photo by Jamie Benedict.
sentences.chinese: 最後一張，是一條密蘇里河釣上的蒙大拿褐鱒。

sentences.english: Four years later, Montana granted women the right to vote.
sentences.chinese: 四年後，蒙大拿給予婦女投票權。

sentences.english: A city of western Montana west-northwest of Helena.
sentences.chinese: 密蘇拉美國蒙大拿州西部赫勒拿西北偏西方的城市。

sentences.english: He works for the United States Geological Survey in Bozeman, Montana.
sentences.chinese: 他的作品爲美國地質調查局在蒙大拿州博茲曼，。

sentences.english: Bones of the Corythosaurus have been found in Montana in the United States, and in Canada.
sentences.chinese: 在美國的蒙大拿州和加拿大發現過冠龍化石。

sentences.english: Montana is unofficially nicknamed "Big Sky Country."
sentences.chinese: 蒙大拿州非正式的稱爲“大天空之州”。

sentences.english: He worked construction the next summer instead of returning to Montana.
sentences.chinese: 那年夏天他去建築工地打工，沒有再去蒙大拿的牧場。

definition: big shot (leading some field or group)/godfather
(coll.) leading light/superstar/badass/(coll.) higher-priced model of Lamborghini
(abbr. for 泰山北斗[Tai4 Shan1 Bei3 dou3]) distinguished figure/doyen/revered authority
